original_title: LAUGFS Gas wins Gold  at TAGS Awards 2024
original_body_lines: LAUGFS Gas PLC, a leading energy solutions provider, has once again demonstrated its leadership and excellence in corporate reporting by clinching the prestigious Gold Award in the Power and Energy category at the TAGS Awards 2024, organised by the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Sri Lanka (CA Sri Lanka).
This significant recognition marks another milestone for LAUGFS Gas, highlighting its unwavering commitment to transparency, sustainability, and impactful stakeholder communication.

The TAGS Awards, celebrated for 59 years, is a hallmark event recognising excellence in corporate reporting, promoting accountability, and encouraging innovation in financial and non-financial disclosures. LAUGFS Gas’s victory at this year’s awards underscores its adherence to the globally recognised Global Reporting Initiative (GRI) Sustainability Reporting Standards, ensuring clarity and consistency in its disclosures.

LAUGFS Gas PLC Cluster CEO Dr. Niroshan Pieries said: “We are incredibly honoured to receive this prestigious Gold Award at the TAGS Awards 2024. This recognition reflects the dedication and relentless effort of our entire team at LAUGFS Gas. It also reinforces our commitment to delivering equitable and sustainable solutions to our customers and stakeholders. Beyond this achievement, we view it as a call to further innovate and uphold our responsibilities to society and the environment. We are committed to driving sustainable growth through operational excellence, modernising energy solutions, and continually enhancing the trust and satisfaction of our customers and stakeholders. Together, we aim to reach new milestones as we power the nation with quality LPG solutions that improve lives and support Sri Lanka’s progress.”
